name: electron-react-password-manager
description: :lock: A secure password storing application. Built with Electron and React

releases.name: PassApp-0.2.4 (Alpha)
releases.body:
- LOTS of visual updates
- Added alert sound effects
- Added a update checker service
- Maximize feature added
- Added fonts
- Version number now shows next to title
- Added a logout button
- The password table is now scrollable

releases.name: PassApp-0.2.3 (Alpha)
releases.body: Frameless window feature added, still a work in progress but seems to work fine at the moment

releases.name: PassApp-0.2.2 (Alpha)
releases.body: This patch significantly improves the visuals and feeling of the progress / loading bar

releases.name: PassApp-0.2.1 (Alpha)
releases.body:
- Issue #5 fixed (Adding a service will allow you to see it directly in the table)
- Encrypt / Decrypt folder function now creates a tar and encrypts that, instead of modifying files and storing IV's in the first line (Thanks @gnCupo !)
- Encrypt / Decrypt folder function stores all tmp files in os.tmpdir()
- Encrypt / Decrypt folder function shows a progress bar

releases.name: PassApp-0.2.0 (Alpha)
releases.body:
- Pepper is now not stored anymore in the database. Because else it is not a pepper
- Can now encrypt and decrypt files. Put your sensitive data in the folder named 'encryptedfolder' and decrypt away!
- Fixed issue #6 
- Feedback when submitted a wrong password
- Fixed a issue where long passwords would being truncated

releases.name: PassApp-0.1.2 (Alpha)
releases.body:
- Using Hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) for authenticity of ciphertext
- AES instead of RSA encryption (aes-256-cbc)
- Pepper added (mac address)
